item.description:
To continue the tradition of Joanna's walks getting rained out, the weather forecast for Saturday is torrential rain. Since I am fighting a cold and I really need to go to work next week, I will not be walking. We will still meet for lunch at 1:15 at Captain Marden's restaurant.

If you want to cancel, please update your RSVP so that someone else can enjoy the meal. If you really want to walk in the rain, let me know and I will meet you in the parking lot with trail maps.

781-237-6719, 781-956-2099

joannaeld@yahoo.com





I just won a free lunch for 8 people at Captain Marden's Restaurant in Wellesley, so I figured what better way to enjoy it then with a group of my Meetup Walking Friends. I will decide on an exact walk when it gets closer to the event. I would like to walk around Lake Waban, but will only do that if the snow level is okay. If the snow is too deep, then we'll find a sidewalk route to take. In any case, it will be a nice walk.

Please only RSVP "Yes" if you can commit to lunch. I do not want to hold a space and then not use it. The free lunch does have one catch and that is that we'll have to listen to a 5 minute presentation on Ameriprise's financial planning services. After that, we each will get a free meal and beverage. NOTE: Captain Mardens does not have a liquor license, so if you want beer or wine, you are welcome to BYOB. http://captainmardens...

If you would like to walk, but skip lunch, RSVP "No" but put "Joining for walk" in the comment section so that we will look for you.

Heavy rain or snow cancels walk, but not lunch. Blizzard will cancel lunch.
item.why: Beautiful walk with a free lunch!
item.name: There is such a thing as a free lunch!
